opinion.posture: Respondent is hereby ordered to appear before Supreme Court on Monday, December 1, 1975, at 9:30 a.m. to show cause why the appeal in the above-entitled matter should not be dismissed for lack of prosecution for failure to comply with Rule 16.
opinion.attorneys:
Kirshenbaum Kirshenbaum, Isidore Kirshenbaum, for petitioner.
John F. Sherlock, Jr., for respondent.
